title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VII, pt. 404 - Disbursements From The Fund
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VII, pt. 404 - Disbursements From The Fund

State Regulations
§ 404.1 - Certification of vouchers for cleanup and removal
§ 404.2 - Approval of research contracts or actions
§ 404.3 - Precedence of cleanup and removal claims
§ 404.4 - Payment of damages

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VII, pt. 404

Statutory authority: Novigation Law, §
191

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
